item.title: Discover the Charm of Prague's Old Town Square: A Tourist's Guide
item.description:
[ad_1] Discover the Charm of Prague’s Old Town Square: A Tourist’s Guide

Prague is a city that effortlessly blends the old with the new, which is why it has become one of the top travel destinations in Europe. And if you’re visiting Prague for the first time, one of the must-visit places is the Old Town Square, which is located in the heart of Prague’s historic district. The square is home to some of Prague’s most iconic landmarks, including the stunning Gothic Church of Our Lady before TÃ½n and the towering Jan Hus Memorial.
